en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
Karamjit Singh, World Champion Relly Driver.

 
KARAMJIT SINGH ACHIEVEMENTS & CAREER HIGHLIGHTS:

- Nine (9) times Malaysian National Champion.
- World Champion (PWRC) 2002.
- Asia Pacific Rally Champion 2001.
- Champion Merdeka Endurance Race 2000.
- Asia Pacific Production Rally Champion 1997.
- 2002 Malaysian Sikhs Association Man of the Year.
- 2002/03/04 Malaysian Motor Sports Man of the Year.
- Conferred SIS title by HRH Sultan of Selangor in 2003.
- Conferred AMN title by HRH King of Malaysia in 2003.
- Asia Pacific Rally Champion 2004.
- Asia Pacific Rally Champion 2002.
- Aisa Pacific Rally Champion 2000.
- Thailand National Rally Champion 1998.
- 2002 NST-SPORTS TOTO Man of the Year.
- 2002 MSN National Sportsman of the Year.
- Works driver - KST Ralliart China 2006-07.
- Winner - Rally Malaysia 2006.

In 2005, my car overturned during competition and I suffered from persistent back pains as a result. A year later, I was introduced to FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. After wearing it, my pains disappeared and I was able to focus on winning again. FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant not only enhance my physical well-being but also the mental stamina required during the grueling competition rounds.

meta.description: I was introduced to FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. After wearing it, my pains disappeared and I was able to focus on winning again.
